1.0.name: wordpress/selective-tags
1.0.description:
Selective Tag wp Plugin, provides sidebar widgets which can be used to display tags in the sidebar.

Features

Sidebar Widget

Selective Tag wp Plugin, provides sidebar widgets which can be used to display tags in the sidebar. You can have multiple widgets with different set of tags configured for each one of them.

Each widget allows you to choose

  • The set of tags dsplayed which is selected by admin

Template function

Translation

  • Swedish
  • Turkish
  • Belorussian
  • German
  • Dutch

The pot file is available with the Plugin. If you are willing to do translation for the Plugin, use the pot file to create the .po files for your language and let me know. I will add it to the Plugin after giving credit to you.

Support

Support for the Plugin is available from the Plugin's home page. If you have any questions
